pages.text: If you see Tualang or Fig trees in your travels, you'll be pleased to know that you'll be able to create $(l:firmaciv/watercraft)Boats$() with them just like any other kind of Wood

pages.title: Softwoods
pages.text: Softwoods have sufficiently soft enough pulp and bark that they're perfect for creating $(l:firmaciv/canoe)Dugout Canoes$()

pages.title: Hardwoods
pages.text: Known for their exceptional sturdiness, Hardwood trees are ideal for creating larger and sophisticated Watercrafts such as $(l:firmaciv/rowboat)Rowboats$() and $(l:firmaciv/sloop)Sloops$()
